Summary: clear night, white pin-prick size fireball grew in size, assumed many shapes like a laser-light show Etch-A-Sketch as it drew nearer; as a huge triangle it hovered ground-level 50 yards away then FLOATED away passing close above our heads!
Object Shape: Circle, Fireball, Flash, Star-like, Triangle, Other
divs: Sighting DetailsI would prefer to tell this story to someone face-to-face, as we experienced a second sighting of a different craft three weeks later in the exact same spot!
